General.Name: Chongqing Shunbo Aluminum Co Ltd
General.Description: Chongqing Shunbo Aluminum Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and sale of recycled aluminum alloy ingots in China. Its products are used in automobiles, new energy vehicles, general machinery and equipment, communication equipment, electronic appliances, hardware lamps, motorcycles, and other industries. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Chongqing, China.
